greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of numbers that are not multiples of 8.
comment: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (if p=2 then A019590(e) else 1), p prime and e>0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1).
formula: For the general case: the characteristic function of numbers that are not multiples of m is a(n) = floor((n-1)/m)-floor(n/m)+1, m,n > 0. - _Boris Putievskiy_, May 08 2013
a(n) = sign(n mod 8). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 21 2014
a(n) = sign( 1 - floor(cos(Pi*n/4)) ). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 21 2014
Euler transform of length 8 sequence [ 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1, 1]. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 24 2014
Moebius transform is length 8 sequence [ 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1]. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 24 2014
maple: with(numtheory); A168181:=n->signum(n mod 8); seq(A168181(n), n=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 21 2014
program: (MAGMA) [Sign(n mod 8) : n in [0..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 21 2014
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 30 2009
